views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10 to 13

MySwitches Gives the Opportunity to Get Custom options for the UI Switches on System Wide!

Configure options from Settings.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak and its options.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.4 - iOS 13 Compatible. - Cleanup. Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to Make Stiffness the On/Off Switches Animations.
- Added the option to Make Damping the On/Off Switch Animations.
- Fixed the Issue with the Last libcolorpicker Updates.
Version 1.0.2
- Added support for iOS 12 and arm64e/A12.
Version 1.0.1
- Added some Colors :-) (libcolorpicker Dependency).

Now you can Custom Select the Colors of your Switches (Requested on Twitter by @albyvar25).
